name: Siren's Cove
description:
For the 2022 Ace Jam!

Take control of a ship of asexuals and aromantics as you navigate past rocky islands housing deadly sirens. And don't think you're safe just because they can't tempt your crew with promises of love and beautiful people just because no one on your crew is into that. It just means they have to get a bit more creative...

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Press Left/Right (Or A/D) repeatedly when prompted

Thanks for playing!
